H0.text: What surname connects equestrians Michael, Ellen, William, Robert and John. SMITH

H1.text: What surname connects equestrians Michael, Ellen, William, Robert and John. PATTERSON

H2.text: What surname connects equestrians Michael, Ellen, William, Robert and John. O'CONNOR

H3.text: What surname connects equestrians Michael, Ellen, William, Robert and John. WHITAKER

A4.text: John Whitaker MBE (born 5 August 1955, Huddersfield) is a British equestrian and Olympian who competes in show jumping.

A5.text: Whitaker is married to Clare Barr and has three children, including Robert Whitaker.
